description.ko: 무한한 우주의 끝에서 별빛으로 형성된 구조물을 묘사한 거대한 우주 풍경입니다.
description.en: A vast cosmic landscape depicting a structure formed from starlight at the edge of the infinite universe.

prompt: An impossible celestial cathedral formed by the gravitational lensing of a supermassive black hole, with pillars of compressed starlight and swirling #3D1A78 dark matter filaments. Surrounded by a massive event horizon and gas clouds of #0D0221 and #7B68EE. Cosmic horror majesty on a massive scale. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Detailed textures of stardust and celestial debris. Dramatic lighting from the accretion disk core, creating a sense of infinite depth and the silent majesty of the abyss.
